Title: Pilot
Plot: A murder reunites former detective Carrie Wells with her ex-boyfriend and colleague; Carrie must use her rare ability to help solve the case.
GuestStars: Deanna Dungan, Samira Wiley, Thomas Guiry, Sofia Jean Gomez, Madison Arnold, Robert Vataj, Andrew Katz, Haley Murphy, Victoria Leigh, Temur Mamisashvili, John Sharian, Timothy Adams, Roxanna Hope, Vanessa Aspilla
